extendedInfo.description: Follow the game from every angle with the most detailed Premier League app on the market.With over 2.5 Million downloads, Sportsmate Mobileâs apps are the fastest way to get live scores, stats and news."If you follow the EPL, you just have to grab @Sportsmate's EPL app. It's so damn awesome. Hands down the best EPL app around.""Best football app I've ever used! Looks great, itâs fast and really easy to use."Full 2013/2014 season fixtures: * Premier League* UEFA Champions League * UEFA Europa League* F.A. Cup* Capital One CupFeatures incude: * Push notifications* Live scores, goal scorers and extended stats from OPTA Sports* Goal and shot charts* Live text commentary* Team lineups* Live league table * News, match previews and match reviews from Sky Sports* Full player profiles* Latest tweets from all your favourite players, clubs* Full season statsWho are Sportsmate Mobile?Founded in 2009, Sportsmate Mobile is an independent mobile development company based in Melbourne, Australia. With your feedback and support, we look forward to continuing the evolution of our apps. Please send all feedback to:* Email - support@sportsmatemobile.com* Twitter - @Sportsmate* Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/sportsmate

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, very quick and so so useful. Nice size too.
reviews.author: joseph linsdell

reviews.title: Best EPL app!!!
reviews.comment: I\'m loving this coverage and the ui is so easy on the eyes.. Very rich news coverage and outstanding live updates! Well done guys! I wish there were pictures to accompany the squad profiles but that\'s the only improvement I can suggest..
reviews.author: Michaela Burton

reviews.title: Brilliant and quick
reviews.comment: Good app its so quick and updates realy quickly to
reviews.author: Owen Green

reviews.title: Issue
reviews.comment: Hi there,   Everything is fine with the application but I can see only 2012/13 fixtures. Could you guys please make it possible to view 2013/14 fixture ?  Under Match Day : Premier League 2012 is selected. How to change it so as to view fixtures of 2013 ?   Thank You, Kush
reviews.author: Kush Chandra Shrestha

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good app love the notification nd up to date stats very good app in my opinion
reviews.author: adam griffiths

reviews.title: The BEST
reviews.comment: This is definitely the best app to know about all European soccer news.
reviews.author: Mahbubul Haque

reviews.title: Could be so much better
reviews.comment: Like the news and team UI. But the stats aren\'t correct. And we call it \'table\' not \'ladder\'. Also displaying goal difference in a table is also very critical. Software point of view app is good. But looks like an app designed by people who don\'t know football too well
reviews.author: Prince Goyal

reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Simply a fantastic app. Lovely presentation, amazingly comprehensive stats and all updates are instant.  A perfect football app and it\'s free which is great.
reviews.author: Paul Byrne

reviews.title: La liga live 2013 / 14
reviews.comment: I want la liga version also plzzzz come up with it.
reviews.author: Imtiz Fahim

reviews.title: Lot of space
reviews.comment: It takes lot of space almost 200mb thinking of unstalling it..
reviews.author: jeevan limbu

reviews.comment: Not that good see for your self keep on closing down on my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: That\'s what I was always looking for!
reviews.comment: Excellent app keeps me updated plus so much more.thank you so to the maker of this app.
reviews.author: kawshar ahmed

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Awsome application. But when is la liga bbva app coming?
reviews.author: Abdelkarim Daaboul

reviews.comment: This app is absoloutely HORRENDOUS!! It only has premier league and you cannot even watch live football or catch up! If I was I wont get it!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Just the app Bpl lovers would like to have ..Love everything about this. It would me more wonderful if you could fix the force crash bux..
reviews.author: Rohan Sharma

reviews.title: Great app  but..
reviews.comment: This app is great and it works really well. The one thing that its is missing is that it should tell you what tv channel each match is on. This would be very useful
reviews.author: Andrew Bell

reviews.title: good app with few glitches
reviews.comment: Wow...latest updatest are amazing...both of my problems hv been resolved....thanx a ton guys!!!!....  prev review-This is surely a useful app for me to check and stay tuned to all soccer action...however the stats option doesnt works for me and force closes the app,also the latest fixture should be pointed to stop unnecessary scrolling that has to be done..these are my 2suggestions..however i m using this app since an year and has been useful for me.....
reviews.author: Saurabha Deshpande

reviews.title: Remove setting button
reviews.comment: You app has sliding menu so why it has the 3 button menu. Please remove it rest of the app is good
reviews.author: Prathamesh Labhade

reviews.title: Extraordinary
reviews.comment: Simply the best app. Thanks!
reviews.author: Alan Ay\303\263n

reviews.comment: One of the best app ever
